11111.content: What type of wish did he wish for?
11111.title: Danny

choices: Nothing seemed out of the ordinary
Wake up to a new goal
111111.content:
Danny has a long, tough, dangerous, and crazy day battling ghosts(and the box ghost). He was looking out the window late one night and was wondering to a certain genie ghost and how her ability to grant wishes may feel.

“I wish I could grant wishes though.” Danny said sighing. But as fate had it that same genie ghost was near and gave a smirk. “Your wish is my command.”

Danny turned upon hearing that only to see air. “Was That Desiree?! Going ghost!” He transformed into ghost form and began to fly in search of her.

Though he did not find her he did find a lamp and thought it may have been her. When he went near it before a bright light hit him.
111111.title: Wishes to grant wishes

choices: Why help when you could cause mischief
1111111.content:
Danny woke in bed as nothing seemed out of the ordinary. “What a strange dream?” Danny got dressed in his normal clothes before leaving to school.

He walked down the street and heard-“I wish I could be beautiful like an actress.” Said a woman next to him. And before Danny knew it replied “Your wish is granted.” What stood in the woman’s spot was a beautiful woman and what stood in Danny’s spot was a beautiful Persian woman.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/c3/0c/f3/c30cf...

“Always good to help.” Danny(?) Then left as golden bracers appeared on her arms. She ran into another person wishing for something before granting it. This caused her clothes to change into a belly dancers garb. And filled out her hips and breasts.

https://i.pinimg.com/736x/2a/53/70/2a537...
1111111.title: Nothing seemed out of the ordinary

choices: Dani starts to realize this is wrong
11111112.content:
Danny enjoyed helping everyone but realized he has the power why use it for other people when she could use it for her own delight.

“I wish that there was no sand.” Said a guy. “Your wish is my command.” Sand fell on him. “Argh...No I hate sand, it’s course stiff and it just gets everywhere!” Dani began to laugh as her curves grew more pronounced.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c4/d9/75/...

Dani sees another person making a wish and grants it..... you think what happened all I know is that her butt got bigger.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c9/9f/23/...

info.brief_description: The cast of Danny Phantom endure various types of transformations (outside of the usual).
info.description:
Time to start stories based around the half ghost from Nick. As usual, nothing that is natural to the cast in the show itself. Get creative.

Another rule is no Amorpho. Why? Because he's already a shape-shifter. He can serve as the cause, but not the victim. Feels like cheating since he could potentially transform into anything on his own accord.

Not much else in terms of rules for this one.
